  1. ANNA CITY NEWS 


    Stay up to date

  1. Friendly reminder regarding the City of Anna Water Irrigation Regulations.

    The Landscape and Water Management Regulations adopted in Part II, Article 8, Section 16 of the Anna City Code require the following water conservation measures: Read on...

  2. Public Notice

    The Texas Commission on Environmental Quality requires water purveyors to provide a public notice when a single measurement of fluoride exceeds 2.0 mg/L. Read on...

  3. City Council Election, May 4, 2019

    A general election will be held May 4, 2019 to fill City Council Places 2, 4 and 6. Candidates are elected to a three-year term of office. Additional Info...

  4. Anna Mayor presents first State of the City update

    ANNA (March 21, 2019) About 100 Anna neighbors attended the inaugural State of the City address by Mayor Nate Pike at the Anna ISD Board Room on March 19. Read on...
